contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 4, 1900 D Abthorpe Contest
Abthorpe Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
abthorpe-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Vicarage Grounds, Abthorpe, Northamptonshire, England, UK 12 bands entered, 6 competed March contest: 1. Rugby ("Viva Pettee"), 2. Yardley ("Imperial"), 3. Abthorpe ("Hero of the South"). Best soprano - Astcote. Best trombone - Rugby. Best cornet - Yardley Goboin. Best euphonium - Abthorpe.
Aug. 13, 2013, 9:08 p.m. June 16, 2018, 9:16 a.m.
1 Yardley Gobion Joseph R. Lambert Songs of England [Round]
2 Rugby Town J. Finch Songs of England [Round]
3 Astcote United J. Long Songs of England [Round]
4 Abthorpe W. Middleton Songs of the Sea
Unknown Result Silverstone Silver F. Brown Songs of the Sea
Unknown Result Bugbrooke A. Ashby Lurline [unknown arranger]
